texts.content_text1: Upon completion of this module, participants will be able to:
texts.content_text20:
Define the concept of child-friendly justice in line with international and
EU legal standards.
texts.content_text21:
Identify the key principles of child-friendly justice (e.g. participation, best
interests of the child, protection from harm, dignity, and non-
discrimination).
texts.content_text22:
Recognise how these principles apply at different stages of judicial and
administrative procedures involving children.
